snippet.title: [Level 1 Stats] Valkyria Chronicles 3 E2 - Extra Missions: Fangs of the Viper - 1 Turn
snippet.description:
Mission Name: Fangs of the Viper
Mission Objectives: Enable the Huge Drawbridge Switch
Restrictions: None
Grade: ★★★★
Ace Name: Holy Iron
Ace Drop 1: Gull
Ace Drop 2: None
Ranking: S: 4 | A: 5 | B: 6 | C: 20

This is a DLC mission that is not included in the "E2" version of Valkyria Chronicles 3 and therefore, entirely in Japanese. Translations may not be 100% accurate but it is at least something to go off.

--------------------
